summary: This module sets up a performance benchmark for a relational graph convolutional network applied to entity classification on a homogeneous graph that lacks explicit node features. It constructs learnable node embeddings, configures the RGCN layers, runs training iterations, and records timing information to evaluate speed.
business_intent: Enable developers and researchers to measure and compare the computational efficiency of RGCN models, aiding in hardware selection, optimization decisions, and algorithmic improvements for graph neural network workloads.
